Package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.toggle

Class ToggleServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.base.AbstractComponentService<ToggleComponentType,Toggle>
io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.toggle.ToggleServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ToggleService
public class ToggleServiceImpl extends AbstractComponentService<ToggleComponentType,Toggle> implements ToggleService
Implementation of the ToggleService interface, providing methods to activate or deactivate toggles, as well as check if they are enabled or activated. Extends AbstractComponentService to manage creation and retrieval of Toggle instances.

This class references ToggleComponentType to identify the correct toggle component, ensuring consistent behavior for a variety of toggle-like elements (switches, checkboxes, etc.) across different UI designs.

Author:
